        private void initBoard()
        Called when a new board is created. Puts all the pieces on the board for a new game

          java.lang.String move)
   throws java.lang.Exception
        Parameters:
        color - String color representing who is currently moving,
        move - String move representing where the move is being attempted
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Throws exception if piece is attempted to move out of bounds or is null Method to move a given piece if the proposed move is valid

      • canPieceMove

        private boolean canPieceMove(java.lang.String color)
        Checks if piece can move to get king out of Check
        Parameters:
        color - String color representing which player is being tested for possible moves
        Returns:
        true if the given player has any valid moves that don't result in check, false otherwise Tests all pieces for the given player to see if they can move in any way that will result in that player not being in check

      • getKingPos

        private int[] getKingPos(java.lang.String color,
                         Piece[][] curBoard)
        Gets the king's position on the board
        Parameters:
        color - String color representing which color's king is being searched for
        curBoard - Piece[][] representing the board that is being searched
        Returns:
        kingPos 1D array of the position of the king for color Method to search for the king for a given color

                       Piece[][] curBoard)
        Checks if King is in Check
        Parameters:
        color - String color representing which piece is being tested for check
        curBoard - 2d Piece array representing the current board
        Returns:
        true if the given color is in check, false otherwise Method to test if a given player is in check or not

      • checkPromotion

        private boolean checkPromotion(java.lang.String color)
        Checks to see if there is a pawn that is in position for a promotion
        Parameters:
        color - String color representing which color is being checked for a possible promotion
        Returns:

      • promote

                     int newRow,
                     int newCol,
                     java.lang.String color)
        Promotes the pawn to the desired Piece
        Parameters:
        desiredPiece - String representing the player's desired piece upon promotion,
        newRow - int for which row to put the piece
        newCol - int for which col to place the piece,
        color - color representing which player is getting the promotion
